```{r setup}
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
library(ggplot2)
library(feather)
library(data.table)
```

```{r load data}
source('cat.R')
source('sweeper.R')
df.cat <- cat.load(params$directory)
df.cat.bases <- cat.bases(df.cat)
df.sweeper <- sweeper.load(params$directory)
```
